div.p: Currently, support for present and future MEI users is available via the MEI-L discussion list. By subscribing to this list, you may contact the MEI community, whose members are happy to discuss general issues regarding music encoding as well as detailed encoding and modelling questions. Anyone can subscribe to the list, and everyone is welcome. Also, the archives of the list are open to the public and can be browsed online.
For queries or comments about non-encoding issues, please see the list of addresses on the contact page.
